author: PlayStation
description:
In today's special State of Play presentation, Creative Director Graeme Timmins and Senior Project Producer Anthony Nicholson showed off the deepest ever look at Borderlands 4's explosive, carnage-filled gameplay, including:

😎 4 New Vault Hunters
🧨 WILDEST Weapons Ever
💨 New Traversal Mechanics
🌎 Seamless New Planet to Explore

Break free in Borderlands 4 on Sep. 12, 2025 💥 

Borderlands 4 is a mayhem-fueled looter shooter, jam-packed with billions of weapons, outrageous enemies, and intense co-op action. Explore a dangerous hidden planet Kairos as one of four new badass Vault Hunters. 

Break free from the oppressive Timekeeper, a ruthless dictator who dominates the masses from on high. Now, a world-altering catastrophe threatens his perfect Order, unleashing mayhem across the planet. Ignite a resistance and blast your way through mechanical monstrosities, bloodthirsty bandits, and vicious beasts, with new traversal mechanics like: double jumping, gliding, dodging, fixed-point grapp
title: Borderlands 4 - State of Play Deep Dive | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Deploy to the infamous BO1 Numbers Station, battle in an estate turned KGB safehouse, or light it up in a familiar favorite. Three epic maps are coming with Season 03 Reloaded in Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 on May 1st.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 03 Reloaded Multiplayer Maps | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-crew-motorfest/

Introducing the fastest plane ever seen in The Crew: the Alpha Jet. Coming in two styles, Red Bull Edition & Stock Edition, it marks the arrival of a brand-new vehicle category: JETS! Get ready to push the speed limits to the maximum. 

Available from April 30th in #TheCrewMotorfest

The Crew Motorfest is available on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4.
 
Transfer hundreds of cars from The Crew 2 to The Crew Motorfest for FREE with the Collection Import.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: The Crew Motorfest - Alpha Jet Trailer (feat. Red Bull) | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10005853/

WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers is coming to PlayStation 5 on July 24, and pre-orders are now live.
Watch the official Pre-Order and Release Date Trailer featuring the fearsome Bride boss fight, new weapon and spell gameplay, and a look at the dark forces rising in the land of Shu.

WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers is a soulslike action RPG set during the chaotic final years of the Ming Dynasty. You play as Wuchang, a pirate warrior afflicted by a mysterious illness known as the Feathering. Explore forgotten temples, unravel ancient secrets, and absorb the powers of fallen bosses to become a legend forged in shadow and flame.

Pre-order now on PlayStation 5 and upgrade to the Deluxe edition for bonuses and to secure your path into one of the most anticipated soulslike experiences of the year.

PlayStation Store: https://505.games/WUCHANGPS

#ps5 #ps5games #PlayStation #WuchangGame 

Rated Mature
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers - Pre-order Offer and Deluxe Edition Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EP4389-PPSA04735_00-MXVSATV2021PS5EU

Season 4 of MX vs ATV Legends is here, adding new features and content to the game! Are you ready for brand new 2025 vehicles from your favorite factory brands, a facility to call your home, improved terrain deformation, a customizable & enhanced S4 HUD, or the Pro Physics MX450F bike?

During Season 4, we will also be adding replay & photo mode (yes, we’re late), new weather scenarios, physics and proximity HUD, rider animations improvements and gear presets, enhanced customization, and more!

And did we mention that the 2025 Monster Energy Supercross Championship returns to MX vs ATV?

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #mxvsatvlegends
title: MX vs ATV Legends - Season 4 Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011016/

Against the Storm is coming to PlayStation 5 & PlayStation 4!

A dark fantasy city builder where you must rebuild civilization in the face of apocalyptic rains. As the Queen’s Viceroy, lead humans, beavers, lizards, foxes, and harpies to reclaim the wilderness and secure a future for civilization's last survivors.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Against the Storm - Announcement Trailer I PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009182

DIG VR is out now on PS VR2! 

DIG VR captures the sheer joy, adrenaline and frustrations of life on a digger in an exciting experience for novices and pros. Featuring authentic, immersive controls that recreate the feeling of driving a real digger, DIG VR is a light-simulation game with a casual arcade-twist!

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Dig VR - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games
